attributes.title: This app made me cry
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I wish I wouldn’t have because when I opened it my phone crashed and I lost every single picture and contact in my phone. I had to go get a new phone and when I did the first thing I did was download the app again and all of a sudden I dropped my new phone on the pavement outside the Apple store and it shattered. I cried. I think it’s rigged and a curse.

attributes.title: my life is ruined
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to learn about our wonderful orange man in the office but after taking at least A WEEK to download it kept crashing. layout is very bad. now after telling my mom it was bad she went missing and we can’t find her. i think it was the trumpies that use this app. they used the app to find my address and take my mom!!! 0/10 don’t recommend

attributes.title: Disappointing.
attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to stand with my president, learn about his ideas to make this country strong but I ended up leaving the app with a sigh. Obama wasn’t even mentioned once. Even the fantastic and monumental movements that he’s made weren’t brought up. I hope that this gets fixed soon but until then don’t bother downloading. 😔 I wish I could give no stars at all.

attributes.title: Racist
attributes.review: This app is by far the worst app🤡💔I ever downloaded, I saw this big ugly orange🧡✨🦊🦁🌞🍁🍂orangutan as soon as I got in and I may now be blind it burned my eyes🌚🌟✨⚡️🌪 hurt and I never want anyone to download this. It’s the sorry app ever and direct deserve to be downloaded,⛈🌩❄️☄️there’s also racist chinos one the app to who think they run this place when there hiding behind a screen. I don’t like going into an app and seeing racist fat orange orangutan lookin chumps🧡✨🙈🧚🏽😈💅🏽💫

attributes.title: Really Buggy
attributes.review: I’m not a part of the whole tik tok kids group. I downloaded this app to see how your election was going and the rally’s that I might be able to go to. Every time I opened the app it would crash. I have an older phone so I thought it was just my phone acting up. But it wouldn’t let me open the app so I just ended up deleting it. You should really work on fixing this.

attributes.title: No enough Don Jr
attributes.review: I was really looking forward to photos of our great first son, Don Jr! Sadly this is more of a political app than simply a photo album of the first family, my gooch is very upset as it had nothing to pleasure it since only seeing cheeto man turned me off.  This app should be renamed to Turn Offs 2020 as there aren’t enough photos to serve this app’s main purpose, of allowing my body to orgasm violently to photos of Don Jr.

attributes.title: terrible really terrible
attributes.review: after getting the app it kept kicking me out and once it finally let me in it didnt let me log in. this app need fixin or dont i dont care. it made my phone reset many times. its not worth getting. it also made my brother stab out pet snake smh. this app KILLS LITERAL THINGS NOT WORTH GETTING. anyways you should never get this, this is coming from a professional app reviewer. HAVE A GREAT DAY. also vote nagito komaeda for president.

attributes.title: TikTok (and issues)
attributes.review: Honestly I don’t usually write reviews and this is mostly for TikTok, but when I downloaded this app I actually wanted to see what this bastard was going to do for America. And it keep on crashing and showing me pictures of trump which I do NOT want to see. It was basically exiting me out every time I opened the app, no this app is terrible. So if you want me to give u good reviews trump, please don’t ban TikTok.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS
attributes.review: this is by far the worst app i’ve ever seen. 1) it’s all about this fat cheeto puff that says hes the president of the united state’s like as if👹🥰😈 2) every living thing died in my house as soon as i downloaded it like this app just is cursed😪😢😭 3) this app just brings bad vibes into your life it makes you realize how messed up america truly is with him as our president💔 so that being said vote blue and don’t download this app👁👄👁

attributes.title: What!!!
attributes.review: At first I got this app for the gen z review but I wanted to see how bad that really was first. I tried it out and it was terrible. It continuously crashed and at first I thought it was my phone but it didn’t happen for mother apps. I gave it another day just to make sure that wilt was fully developed or something and kept doing the same thing. For an app form the president I honestly expected better.
